resources.string:
ABOUT BALANCE TRANSFER
  • You need to know your security code to transfer your balance.To find the security code, type \"scode\" and send sms to 1415.You should get security code in message reply shortly.
  • You can transfer balance from Rs. 10 up to Rs. 500 only per transfer.
  • You cannot transfer balance from one carrier network to another.
  • The service charge for the balance transfer is free in Namaste.
  • You can only transfer balance up to 20 times a day.
  • The validity date of receiving mobile is not increased with transfer.

ABOUT NAMASTE CREDIT
  • It is loan service provided by Namaste for it\'s GSM customers.
  • The debt is automatically cleared in the next recharge.
  • No extra charge is imposed on the credit.
  • The credit balance is activated automatically on the low balance to provide uninterruptible calling experience.
  • The amount of the credit allocated differs from one customer to another and is made on loyalty based assessment. It means the more you use the Namaste network, the more credit you are allocated.

ABOUT FRIENDS & FAMILY
  • It is a special service which allows you to make call to 5 different Namaste number in discounted price.
  • The voice tariff is 55 paisa/minute for GSM/CDMA post-paid and 70 paisa/minute for pre-paid subscriber.
  • The service can be enabled for free.

ABOUT MISSED CALL ALERT
  • This service provides you the information about the calls that you were unable to receive.
  • This service can be enabled free of cost and it is auto-renewed as well.
  • Upon successful subscription of the service, you will receive a SMS in the format: "You have a missed call from 984XXXXXXX(no.) at 2021-05-19 01:00:30" where no. represents the total call attempt.

ABOUT CALLER RING BACK TONE
  • This service replaces the boring standard ringback tone with hit songs and dialogues.
  • Send \"top\" to 1455 to get the top songs crbt code.
  • Caller tune subscription charge : Rs. 5 weekly and Rs. 20 monthly
  • Tone charge : Rs. 2.5 weekly and Rs. 10 monthly

Intuitive mode is turned off! So, the application cannot parse the important information such as phone number, balance and SIM owner\'s name from response using accessibility service. Click here if you would like to turn it on.
Take data, voice and SMS packs
Click the save button to save the security code for next use.
Using the security code that is cached from earlier transfer; click to edit it
Please enter recipient\'s 10 digits NTC phone number.
Please enter amount(in Rs.) between 10 and 500.
Click the button to query for your phone number. You can perform query for phone number for all the SIM cards in this way.
Click the button to query for your account balance. You can perform query for phone balance for all the SIM cards in this way.
Click the button to query for SIM owner\'s name. You can perform query for SIM card owner\'s name for Namaste & Ncell SIM cards in this way.
